hero.headline: Earn Up to 30% Month Per Sale, Lifetime Recurring Commissions
hero.subheadline: Become an Authorized Menuthere Reseller. Deliver premium digital menu solutions to restaurants with seamless in-person demos. Scale commissions to 30% on verified recurring revenue.

benefits.title: Recurring Revenue
benefits.description: Build a passive income stream. Earn lifetime recurring commissions as long as your clients stay subscribed.

benefits.title: Zero Investment
benefits.description: No upfront fees or hidden costs. Start earning from your first sale with our fully commission-driven model.

benefits.title: Instant Payouts
benefits.description: We pay you the same day we receive the subscription funds. No waiting for monthly cycles.

features.title: Unlock Revenue for Restaurants
features.description: Independent restaurants lose sales to static PDFs. Solve this with our proven platform, instant QR updates trusted by 600+ locations.

features.title: Award-Winning SaaS Solution
features.description: Provide restaurants with QR menus updated in seconds. Conduct quick on-site demos to drive immediate subscriptions.

features.title: Performance-Based Earnings
features.description: Payouts align directly with revenue. Tiers advance automatically based on total referred lifetime revenue.

reviews.author: Michael Ross
reviews.text: The recurring commission model is fantastic. Once I sign up a restaurant, I keep earning every month.

reviews.author: Sarah Lee
reviews.text: My clients love the product, and I love the same-day payouts. It's the easiest sell I've ever had.

cta.title: Partner with Confidence
cta.description: 600+ live deployments. Field-tested model. Risk-free revenue share. Join our elite partner network today.
